headline.print_headline: Hoeness Quits Bayern, Accepts Jail Term for Tax Evasion
headline.main: Hoeness Quits Bayern, Accepts Jail Term for Tax Evasion

lead_paragraph: Uli Hoeness said on Friday he would accept a 3-1/2-year prison term for evading 27 million euros (22.5 million pounds) in taxes and resigned as president and chairman of Bayern Munich, the club he made into one of the world's most successful football dynasties.
